data: {"page":1,"results":[{"backdrop_path":"/3hEwqtqiXRkJnmHYIFEkADOM2b.jpg","id":61370,"title":"Men in War","original_title":"Men in War","overview":"In Korea, on 6 September 1950, Lieutenant Benson's platoon finds itself isolated in enemy-held territory after a retreat. Soon they are joined by Sergeant Montana, whose overriding concern is caring for his catatonic colonel. Benson and Montana can't stand each other, but together they must get the survivors to Hill 465, where they hope the division is waiting. It's a long, harrowing march, fraught with all the dangers the elusive enemy can summon.","poster_path":"/jfhF7arZn3VAJhrbjpDLLI9MDOC.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[10752,18],"popularity":7.26,"release_date":"1957-06-07","video":false,"vote_average":6.8,"vote_count":56},{"backdrop_path":"/4rw8hb8Idl48PXLss01sXbYnwDf.jpg","id":14815,"title":"The Wind and the Lion","original_title":"The Wind and the Lion","overview":"At the beginning of the 20th century an American woman is abducted in Morocco by Berbers, and the attempts to free her range from diplomatic pressure to military intervention.","poster_path":"/53k9mTyEirFrKXWtKLtDyrUuvYL.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[12],"popularity":14.647,"release_date":"1975-05-22","video":false,"vote_average":6.576,"vote_count":171},{"backdrop_path":"/eozLsgdW5VyUEdPDuDaBD4VB86o.jpg","id":267480,"title":"The Look of Silence","original_title":"The Look of Silence","overview":"An optician grapples with the Indonesian mass killings of 1965-1966, during which his older brother was exterminated.","poster_path":"/7TakQLT8gyzIMG8hX8RLTd5qROQ.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[36,99],"popularity":11.448,"release_date":"2015-07-17","video":false,"vote_average":7.811,"vote_count":254},{"backdrop_path":"/iPt0HhkT4RXM5LjfXtbGsLXNUbk.jpg","id":76543,"title":"Tyrannosaur","original_title":"Tyrannosaur","overview":"The story of Joseph, a man plagued by violence and a rage that is driving him to self-destruction. Anti-globalization activists clashed with the police, with 23-year-old protester Carlo Giuliani shot dead after confronting a police vehicle. In the aftermath, the police organized a night raid on the Diaz high school, where around a hundred people between unarmed protesters—mostly students—and independent reporters who documented the police brutality during the protests had took shelter. What happened next was called by Amnesty International \"the most serious breach of civil liberties in a democratic Western country since World War II.\"","poster_path":"/vcGFlMHToPdYLn3ZMUwHsA8FQr0.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"it","genre_ids":[18,36],"popularity":10.704,"release_date":"2012-04-13","video":false,"vote_average":7.177,"vote_count":418},{"backdrop_path":"/sJOtAbgAHEuzO6HZyRa77YWKbmH.jpg","id":1623,"title":"Brubaker","original_title":"Brubaker","overview":"The new warden of a small prison farm in Arkansas tries to clean it up of corruption after initially posing as an inmate.","poster_path":"/zd8clKupTMTOtO2fq4i6Z4YBhXx.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[80,18],"popularity":32.019,"release_date":"1980-06-20","video":false,"vote_average":7.041,"vote_count":448},{"backdrop_path":"/lOKxu2WFkNhPxLDWzUFCKhN1Vtm.jpg","id":13291,"title":"Traitor","original_title":"Traitor","overview":"When straight arrow FBI agent Roy Clayton heads up the investigation into a dangerous international conspiracy, all clues seem to lead back to former U.S. Special Operations officer Samir Horn.","poster_path":"/va4Uo7L2b4d96JTdRMclO9L2hY0.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[18,28,53,80],"popularity":19.275,"release_date":"2008-08-23","video":false,"vote_average":6.634,"vote_count":625},{"backdrop_path":"/oCT4DGNRkfydLBc3qtICM0vmAZs.jpg","id":11655,"title":"Cronos","original_title":"Cronos","overview":"Faced with his own mortality, an ingenious alchemist tried to perfect an invention that would provide him with the key to eternal life. It was called the Cronos device. When he died more than 400 years later, he took the secrets of this remarkable device to the grave with him. Now, an elderly antiques dealer has found the hellish machine hidden in a statue and learns about its incredible powers. The more he uses the device, the younger he becomes...but nothing comes without a price. Life after death is just the beginning as this nerve-shattering thriller unfolds and the fountain of youth turns bloody.","poster_path":"/bRX8au50CnhC8hXr8AbsCNdb96G.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"es","genre_ids":[18,27,53],"popularity":22.155,"release_date":"1993-11-05","video":false,"vote_average":6.7,"vote_count":621},{"backdrop_path":"/yaiPcHyLzP1hQRmInJ87yRaaS4b.jpg","id":41428,"title":"Tetsuo: The Iron Man","original_title":"鉄男","overview":"A \"metal fetishist\", driven mad by the maggots wriggling in the wound he's made to embed metal into his flesh, runs out into the night and is accidentally run down by a Japanese businessman and his girlfriend. Trigger-happy Charlie soon has James crying for his desk job, but when he learns that the same guys they're trying to catch are after him, James realises that Charlie may be his only hope of survival.","poster_path":"/poVoLKLxUqsTLSntA40Po2F78dZ.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[28,80,53],"popularity":31.753,"release_date":"2010-02-04","video":false,"vote_average":6.3,"vote_count":1929},{"backdrop_path":"/9c77W1XZ4qGMTUYcaGbw3ZNAHOB.jpg","id":48231,"title":"A Dangerous Method","original_title":"A Dangerous Method","overview":"Seduced by the challenge of an impossible case, the driven Dr. Carl Jung takes the unbalanced yet beautiful Sabina Spielrein as his patient.
